title: Network
cleaned_text: As we adapt to the unprecedented changes across the healthcare industry, one tenet remains the same: Consolidated, coordinated care is the best care for all the right reasons. The evidence tells us that keeping care within our system results in better clinical outcomes for patients at lower costs thanks to tight-knit provider relationships, shared EMR data and seamless clinical communication. The directory below has been designed to help you better serve your patients by providing information about the full range of TriHealth providers and services available to deliver the best, personalized, compassionate care they need. Directory information will be updated quarterly. Please [click here](/-/media/trihealth/documents/network/2023/th23-directory-update-guide-0502.pdf?la=en&hash=5B8D272891AC1CECCE96AEF672F3CBE1EAE63C24) to download guidelines and the timelines for submit updates and revisions.
